messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: TV is Bad
messages.msgSnippet: This brings to mind a question plus irritation.  Are they not counting the 4th plane in all their stats? Are the families of the folks who died at the Pentagon
messages.messageBody:
This brings to mind a question plus irritation. Are they not counting the
4th plane in all their stats?

Are the families of the folks who died at the Pentagon and those in the 4th
plane being helped by the 9/11 funds?

And when is enough enough. All the other charities are really hurting
because there are still things going on to collect still more money for
9/11.

Lynda

messages.subject: Re: TV is Bad
messages.msgSnippet: The terrorist attacks do not indicate that violent crime is on the increase.....only that it is coming home to roost. (Plus,
messages.messageBody:
<<September 11, 2002>>

The terrorist attacks do not indicate that violent crime is on the
increase.....only that it is coming home to roost.

(Plus, statistically speaking, the attack was only 3 separate incidents with
mass victims).

Julie
